Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2005 10:51PM joannie wrote: I read your post about your Husband. I have only been married for 9 years and find myself asking my husband why he does not just get up and run, he stays and puts up with all of the crap I deal out to him. It is amazing..when the chips are down, who runs and who stays. Going through this journey with breast cancer not only shows us what love is, but also who is the couragous amounst us.

Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2005 10:41PM joannie wrote: I am starting chemo next week! SCARED TO DEATH!!!I am also having 4 A/C and 4 Taxol. I had a lumpectomy on Sept 8th and had my port put in last week. I had 1.6cm lump with one positive node. grade III ( agressive).
